articles.title: Qatar World Cup: FIFA sells 1.8 million tickets for 2022 tournament
articles.description: Organisers have sold 1.8 million tickets for the World Cup in Qatar, FIFA said on Wednesday ahead of the next round of ticket sales on July 5.
articles.content:
